subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Tarrion Adams rushed for 207 yards and 3 touchdowns as Tulsa defeated No. 23 Ball State, 45-13, in a soggy GMAC Bowl on Tuesday night.
snippet: Tarrion Adams rushed for 207 yards and 3 touchdowns as Tulsa defeated No. 23 Ball State, 45-13, in a soggy GMAC Bowl on Tuesday night.
